Services: FormForConfiguration

FormForConfiguration

FormForConfiguration()

This service can be used to configure default behavior for all instances of formFor within a project. Note that it is a service accessible to during the run loop and not a provider accessible during config.

Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 1

Methods

(static) disableAutoLabels()

Use this method to disable auto-generated labels for formFor input fields.

Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 36

(static) enableAutoLabels()

Use this method to enable auto-generated labels for formFor input fields. Labels will be generated based on attribute-name for fields without a label attribute present. Radio fields are an exception to this rule. Their names are generated from their values.

Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 47

(static) setDefaultDebounceDuration(duration)

Sets the default debounce interval for all textField inputs. This setting can be overridden on a per-input basis (see textField).

Parameters:
Name Type Description
duration int

Debounce duration (in ms). Defaults to 500ms. To disable debounce (update only on blur) pass false.
Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 59

(static) setDefaultSubmitComplete(method)

Sets the default submit-complete behavior for all formFor directives. This setting can be overridden on a per-form basis (see formFor).

Parameters:
Name Type Description
method function

Default handler function accepting a data parameter representing the server-response returned by the submitted form. This function should accept a single parameter, the response data from the form-submit method.
Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 70

(static) setDefaultSubmitError(method)

Sets the default submit-error behavior for all formFor directives. This setting can be overridden on a per-form basis (see formFor).

Parameters:
Name Type Description
method function

Default handler function accepting an error parameter representing the data passed to the rejected submit promise. This function should accept a single parameter, the error returned by the form-submit method.
Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 81

(static) setDefaultValidationFailed(method)

Sets the default validation-failed behavior for all formFor directives. This setting can be overridden on a per-form basis (see formFor).

Parameters:
Name Type Description
method function

Default function invoked when local form validation fails.
Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 91

(static) setRequiredLabel(value)

Sets a default label to be displayed beside each text and select input for required attributes only.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
value String

Message to be displayed next to the field label (ex. "*", "required")
Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 100

(static) setValidationFailedForCustomMessage(value)

Override the default error message for failed custom validations. This setting applies to all instances of formFor unless otherwise overridden on a per-rule basis.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
value String

Custom error message string
Source:
  • services/form-for-configuration.js, line 110

(static) setValidationFailedForEmailTypeMessage(value)

Override the default error message for failed type = 'email' validations. This setting applies to all instances of formFor unless otherwise overridden on a per-rule basis.

value String
